name: Nobody told me loot is heavy
name_original: Nobody told me loot is heavy
description:
Up to 5 adventurers enter the dragon's cave. Who gets out, and who burns to death hauling too much treasure at once?

In this game, you set out to rob the dragon's hoard of treasures. However, the more treasures you pick up, the slower you will move! Manage your risk by deciding how much to carry, and when to flee the cave or dive in for more. And watch out for your friends leading the dragons into you...

Online multiplayer for up to 5 players.  Made for FGJ21 with a team of five!
